83  class ParaTree{
84 
85  // =================================================================================== //
86  // MEMBERS //
87  // =================================================================================== //
88  public:
89  static const std::string DEFAULT_LOG_FILE;
91  typedef std::unordered_map<int, std::array<uint32_t, 2>> ExchangeRanges;
92 
93  enum Operation {
94  OP_NONE,
95  OP_INIT,
96  OP_PRE_ADAPT,
97  OP_ADAPT_MAPPED,
98  OP_ADAPT_UNMAPPED,
99  OP_LOADBALANCE_FIRST,
100  OP_LOADBALANCE
101  };
102 
103  struct LoadBalanceRanges {
104  enum ExchangeAction {
105  ACTION_UNDEFINED = -1,
106  ACTION_NONE,
107  ACTION_SEND,
108  ACTION_DELETE,
109  ACTION_RECEIVE
110  };
111 
112  ExchangeAction sendAction;
113  ExchangeRanges sendRanges;
114 
115  ExchangeAction recvAction;
116  ExchangeRanges recvRanges;
117 
118  LoadBalanceRanges();
119  LoadBalanceRanges(bool serial, const ExchangeRanges &_sendRanges, const ExchangeRanges &_recvRanges);
120 
121  void clear();
122  };
123 
124  private:
125  typedef std::unordered_map<int, std::array<uint64_t, 2>> PartitionIntersections;
126 
127  struct AccretionData {
128  int targetRank;
129  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, int> internalSeeds;
130  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, int> foreignSeeds;
131  std::unordered_map<uint64_t, int> population;
132  };

560  // =================================================================================== //
561  // TEMPLATE METHODS //
562  // =================================================================================== //
563 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
564 
567  template<class Impl>
568  void
569  communicate(DataCommInterface<Impl> & userData){
570  //BUILD SEND BUFFERS
571  DataCommunicator communicator(m_comm);
572  size_t fixedDataSize = userData.fixedSize();
573  std::map<int,u32vector >::iterator bitend = m_bordersPerProc.end();
574  std::map<int,u32vector >::iterator bitbegin = m_bordersPerProc.begin();
575  for(std::map<int,u32vector >::iterator bit = bitbegin; bit != bitend; ++bit){
576  int key = bit->first;
577  const u32vector & pborders = bit->second;
578  size_t buffSize = 0;
579  size_t nofPbordersPerProc = pborders.size();
580  if(fixedDataSize != 0){
581  buffSize = fixedDataSize*nofPbordersPerProc;
582  }
583  else{
584  for(size_t i = 0; i < nofPbordersPerProc; ++i){
585  buffSize += userData.size(pborders[i]);
586  }
587  }
588  //enlarge buffer to store number of pborders from this proc
589  buffSize += sizeof(size_t);
590  //build buffer for this proc
591  communicator.setSend(key,buffSize);
592  SendBuffer & sendBuffer = communicator.getSendBuffer(key);
593  //store number of pborders from this proc at the begining
594  sendBuffer << nofPbordersPerProc;
595 
596  //WRITE SEND BUFFERS
597  for(size_t j = 0; j < nofPbordersPerProc; ++j){
598  userData.gather(sendBuffer,pborders[j]);
599  }
600  }
601 
602  communicator.discoverRecvs();
603  communicator.startAllRecvs();
604 
605  communicator.startAllSends();
606 
607  //READ RECEIVE BUFFERS
608  int ghostOffset = 0;
609  std::vector<int> recvRanks = communicator.getRecvRanks();
610  std::sort(recvRanks.begin(),recvRanks.end());
611  for(int rank : recvRanks){
612  communicator.waitRecv(rank);
613  RecvBuffer & recvBuffer = communicator.getRecvBuffer(rank);
614  size_t nofGhostFromThisProc = 0;
615  recvBuffer >> nofGhostFromThisProc;
616  for(size_t k = 0; k < nofGhostFromThisProc; ++k){
617  userData.scatter(recvBuffer, k+ghostOffset);
618  }
619  ghostOffset += nofGhostFromThisProc;
620  }
621  communicator.waitAllSends();
622  };
623 
631  template<class Impl>
632  void
633  loadBalance(DataLBInterface<Impl> & userData, dvector* weight = NULL){
634  //Write info on log
635  (*m_log) << "---------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
636  (*m_log) << " LOAD BALANCE " << std::endl;
637 
638  m_lastOp = OP_LOADBALANCE;
639  if (m_nproc>1){
640 
641  std::vector<uint32_t> partition(m_nproc);
642  if (weight == NULL)
643  computePartition(partition.data());
644  else
645  computePartition(weight, partition.data());
646 
647  weight = NULL;
648 
649  privateLoadBalance(partition.data(), &userData);
650 
651  //Write info of final partition on log
652  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
653  (*m_log) << " Final Parallel partition : " << std::endl;
654  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(0))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[0]+1)) << std::endl;
655  for(int ii=1; ii<m_nproc; ii++){
656  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(ii))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[ii]-m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[ii-1])) << std::endl;
657  }
658  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
659  (*m_log) << "---------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
660 
661  }
662  else{
663  m_loadBalanceRanges.clear();
664 
665  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
666  (*m_log) << " Serial partition : " << std::endl;
667  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(0))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[0]+1)) << std::endl;
668  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
669  (*m_log) << "---------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
670  }
671 
672  }
673 
682  template<class Impl>
683  void
684  loadBalance(DataLBInterface<Impl> & userData, uint8_t & level, dvector* weight = NULL){
685 
686  //Write info on log
687  (*m_log) << "---------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
688  (*m_log) << " LOAD BALANCE " << std::endl;
689 
690  m_lastOp = OP_LOADBALANCE;
691  if (m_nproc>1){
692 
693  std::vector<uint32_t> partition(m_nproc);
694  computePartition(level, weight, partition.data());
695 
696  privateLoadBalance(partition.data(), &userData);
697 
698  //Write info of final partition on log
699  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
700  (*m_log) << " Final Parallel partition : " << std::endl;
701  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(0))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[0]+1)) << std::endl;
702  for(int ii=1; ii<m_nproc; ii++){
703  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(ii))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[ii]-m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[ii-1])) << std::endl;
704  }
705  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
706  (*m_log) << "---------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
707 
708  }
709  else{
710  m_loadBalanceRanges.clear();
711 
712  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
713  (*m_log) << " Serial partition : " << std::endl;
714  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(0))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[0]+1)) << std::endl;
715  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
716  (*m_log) << "---------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
717  }
718 
719  }
720 
730  template<class Impl>
731  void
732  privateLoadBalance(const uint32_t *partition, DataLBInterface<Impl> *userData = nullptr){
733 
734  (*m_log) << " " << std::endl;
735  if (m_serial) {
736  (*m_log) << " Initial Serial distribution : " << std::endl;
737  } else {
738  (*m_log) << " Initial Parallel partition : " << std::endl;
739  }
740  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(0))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[0]+1)) << std::endl;
741  for(int ii=1; ii<m_nproc; ii++){
742  (*m_log) << " Octants for proc "+ std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(ii))+" : " + std::to_string(static_cast<unsigned long long>(m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[ii]-m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[ii-1])) << std::endl;
743  }
744 
745  // Compute load balance ranges
746  std::unordered_map<int, std::array<uint32_t, 2>> sendRanges = evalLoadBalanceSendRanges(partition);
747  std::unordered_map<int, std::array<uint32_t, 2>> recvRanges = evalLoadBalanceRecvRanges(partition);
748 
749  m_loadBalanceRanges = LoadBalanceRanges(m_serial, sendRanges, recvRanges);
750 
751  // Compute information about the new partitioning
752  assert(m_nproc > 0);
753 
754  uint32_t newSizeOctants = partition[m_rank];
755 
756  uint64_t newLastOctantGlobalIdx;
757  uint64_t newFirstOctantGlobalIdx;
758  if (newSizeOctants > 0) {
759  newLastOctantGlobalIdx = partition[0];
760  for (int p = 1; p < m_rank + 1; ++p) {
761  newLastOctantGlobalIdx += partition[p];
762  }
763  --newLastOctantGlobalIdx;
764 
765  newFirstOctantGlobalIdx = newLastOctantGlobalIdx - newSizeOctants + 1;
766  } else {
767  newLastOctantGlobalIdx = 0;
768  newFirstOctantGlobalIdx = 1;
769  }
770 
771  // Partition internal octants
772  if (m_serial) {
773  m_lastOp = OP_LOADBALANCE_FIRST;
774 
775  if (newFirstOctantGlobalIdx != 0) {
776  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < newSizeOctants; ++i){
777  m_octree.m_octants[i] = m_octree.m_octants[newFirstOctantGlobalIdx + i];
778  if (userData) {
779  userData->move(newFirstOctantGlobalIdx + i, i);
780  }
781  }
782  }
783 
784  m_octree.m_octants.resize(newSizeOctants);
785  m_octree.m_octants.shrink_to_fit();
786  m_octree.m_sizeOctants = m_octree.m_octants.size();
787 
788  if (userData) {
789  userData->resize(m_octree.m_sizeOctants);
790  userData->shrink();
791  }
792  } else {
793  // Compute information about the current partitioning
794  uint64_t lastOctantGlobalIdx = m_partitionRangeGlobalIdx[m_rank];
795  uint64_t firstOctantGlobalIdx = lastOctantGlobalIdx - m_octree.m_sizeOctants + 1;
796 
797  // Initialize communications
798  DataCommunicator lbCommunicator(m_comm);
799 
800  if (!userData || userData->fixedSize()) {
801  for (const auto &entry : recvRanges) {
802  int rank = entry.first;
803  uint32_t beginRecvIdx = entry.second[0];
804  uint32_t endRecvIdx = entry.second[1];
805 
806  uint32_t nOctantsToReceive = endRecvIdx - beginRecvIdx;
807  std::size_t buffSize = nOctantsToReceive * Octant::getBinarySize();
808  if (userData) {
809  buffSize += nOctantsToReceive * userData->fixedSize();
810  }
811 
812  lbCommunicator.setRecv(rank, buffSize);
813  lbCommunicator.startRecv(rank);
814  }
815  }
816 
817  for (const auto &entry : sendRanges) {
818  int rank = entry.first;
819  uint32_t beginSendIdx = entry.second[0];
820  uint32_t endSendIdx = entry.second[1];
821 
822  uint32_t nOctantsToSend = endSendIdx - beginSendIdx;
823  std::size_t buffSize = nOctantsToSend * Octant::getBinarySize();
824  if (userData) {
825  if (userData->fixedSize()) {
826  buffSize += nOctantsToSend * userData->fixedSize();
827  } else {
828  for (uint32_t i = beginSendIdx; i < endSendIdx; ++i) {
829  buffSize += userData->size(i);
830  }
831  }
832  }
833  lbCommunicator.setSend(rank, buffSize);
834 
835  SendBuffer &sendBuffer = lbCommunicator.getSendBuffer(rank);
836  for (uint32_t i = beginSendIdx; i < endSendIdx; ++i) {
837  sendBuffer << m_octree.m_octants[i];
838  userData->gather(sendBuffer, i);
839  }
840 
841  lbCommunicator.startSend(rank);
842  }
843 
844  if (userData && !userData->fixedSize()) {
845  lbCommunicator.discoverRecvs();
846  lbCommunicator.startAllRecvs();
847  }
848 
849  // Move resident octants into place
850  if (newSizeOctants > m_octree.m_sizeOctants) {
851  m_octree.m_octants.reserve(newSizeOctants);
852  m_octree.m_octants.resize(newSizeOctants);
853  m_octree.m_sizeOctants = m_octree.m_octants.size();
854 
855  if (userData) {
856  userData->resize(m_octree.m_sizeOctants);
857  }
858  }
859 
860  bool hasResidentOctants;
861  if (newSizeOctants > 0) {
862  hasResidentOctants = true;
863  if (newFirstOctantGlobalIdx > lastOctantGlobalIdx) {
864  hasResidentOctants = false;
865  } else if (newLastOctantGlobalIdx < firstOctantGlobalIdx) {
866  hasResidentOctants = false;
867  }
868  } else {
869  hasResidentOctants = false;
870  }
871 
872  if (hasResidentOctants) {
873  uint32_t firstResidentGlobalOctantIdx = std::max(firstOctantGlobalIdx, newFirstOctantGlobalIdx);
874  uint32_t lastResidentGlobalOctantIdx = std::min(lastOctantGlobalIdx, newLastOctantGlobalIdx);
875 
876  uint32_t nofResidents = lastResidentGlobalOctantIdx - firstResidentGlobalOctantIdx + 1;
877  uint32_t newFirstResidentOffsetIdx = firstResidentGlobalOctantIdx - newFirstOctantGlobalIdx;
878  uint32_t firstResidentOffsetIdx = firstResidentGlobalOctantIdx - firstOctantGlobalIdx;
879 
880  // If residents are moved closer to the head, we need to move
881  // them from the first to the last. Otherwise, if resident are
882  // moved closer to the tail, we need to move them in reversed
883  // order, i.e., from the last to the first (otherwise octants
884  // will be overwritten during the relocaiton).
885  if (newFirstResidentOffsetIdx != firstResidentOffsetIdx) {
886  for (uint32_t i = 0; i < nofResidents; ++i) {
887  int residentIdx;
888  if (newFirstResidentOffsetIdx < firstResidentOffsetIdx) {
889  residentIdx = i;
890  } else {
891  residentIdx = nofResidents - i - 1;
892  }
893 
894  m_octree.m_octants[newFirstResidentOffsetIdx + residentIdx] = m_octree.m_octants[firstResidentOffsetIdx + residentIdx];
895  if (userData) {
896  userData->move(firstResidentOffsetIdx + residentIdx, newFirstResidentOffsetIdx + residentIdx);
897  }
898  }
899  }
900  }
901 
902  if (newSizeOctants < m_octree.m_sizeOctants) {
903  m_octree.m_octants.resize(newSizeOctants);
904  m_octree.m_octants.shrink_to_fit();
905  m_octree.m_sizeOctants = m_octree.m_octants.size();
906 
907  if (userData) {
908  userData->resize(m_octree.m_sizeOctants);
909  userData->shrink();
910  }
911  }
912 
913  // Read buffers and build new octants
914  int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
915  while (nCompletedRecvs < lbCommunicator.getRecvCount()) {
916  int senderRank = lbCommunicator.waitAnyRecv();
917  RecvBuffer &recvBuffer = lbCommunicator.getRecvBuffer(senderRank);
918 
919  const std::array<uint32_t, 2> &recvRange = recvRanges.at(senderRank);
920  uint32_t beginRecvIdx = recvRange[0];
921  uint32_t endRecvIdx = recvRange[1];
922  assert(userData || ((endRecvIdx - beginRecvIdx) == (recvBuffer.getSize() / (Octant::getBinarySize()))));
923  assert(!userData || !userData->fixedSize() || ((endRecvIdx - beginRecvIdx) == (recvBuffer.getSize() / (Octant::getBinarySize() + userData->fixedSize()))));
924 
925  for (uint32_t i = beginRecvIdx; i < endRecvIdx; ++i) {
926  recvBuffer >> m_octree.m_octants[i];
927  if (userData) {
928  userData->scatter(recvBuffer, i);
929  }
930  }
931 
932  ++nCompletedRecvs;
933  }
934 
935  lbCommunicator.waitAllSends();
936  }
937 
938  // Update load balance information
939  updateLoadBalance();
940 
941  // Update ghosts
942  m_octree.m_ghosts.clear();
943  m_octree.m_sizeGhosts = 0;
944 
945  computeGhostHalo();
946 
947  if (userData) {
948  userData->resizeGhost(m_octree.m_sizeGhosts);
949  }
950  };
951 #endif
952 
953  // =============================================================================== //
954 
955  };
956 
957 }
958 
959 #endif /* __BITPIT_PARA_TREE_HPP__ */
